Hello @Nguyen_Truong_Son,

unfortunately, this option is not yet built into Typst, there is a ope issue about it here.
There is a not-so-nice workaround: if you use Typst locally with the CLI you can run an external script, which reads all the file names of the folder and pass them to Typst via the input parameter.
posts.raw:
Hello @Nguyen_Truong_Son,

unfortunately, this option is not yet built into Typst, there is a ope issue about it [here](https://github.com/typst/typst/issues/2123). 
There is a not-so-nice workaround: if you use Typst locally with the CLI you can run an external script, which reads all the file names of the folder and pass them to Typst via the [`input`](https://typst.app/docs/reference/foundations/sys) parameter.
